        public static List<String> generateCountValidationQueries(HiveDataset hiveDataset,
                                                          Optional<Partition> sourcePartition,
                                                          ConvertibleHiveDataset.ConversionConfig conversionConfig)
        Generate Hive queries for validating converted Hive table.
        Parameters:
        hiveDataset - Source HiveDataset.
        sourcePartition - Source Partition if any.
        conversionConfig - ConvertibleHiveDataset.ConversionConfig for conversion.
        Returns:
        Validation Hive queries.

      • generateDataValidationQuery

        public static String generateDataValidationQuery(String sourceTable,
                                                 String sourceDb,
                                                 Table targetTable,
                                                 Optional<Partition> optionalPartition,
                                                 boolean isNestedORC)
        Generates Hive SQL that can be used to validate the quality between two Tables or optionally Partition. The query returned is a basic join query that returns the number of records matched between the two Tables. The responsibility of actually comparing this value with the expected module should be implemented by the user.
        Parameters:
        sourceTable - Source Hive Table name.
        sourceDb - Source Hive database name.
        targetTable - Target Hive Table name.
        optionalPartition - Optional Partition to limit the comparison.
        Returns:
        Query to find number of rows common between two tables.
